page.title: 12THE WELCOME CLUB
page.content: The 'Welcome Club' is for senior people. It is where they can meet their friends, talk together and also play Bingo. The club runs raffles to raise money to buy new materials. The members meet three afternoons a week. They usually come to school at 11:30 so that they can have a lunch in the dinning hall. They meet in the Community Lounge. The atmosphere is warm and very friendly, with three or four people on each table. On the other afternoons, a programme of activities is planned. One group do Needlework, where they make embroidery and their own clothes. There is a beginners group for men and women who want to learn how to sow.
